headline: Tech Weekly podcast: Google under fire
text: Aleks Krotoski speaks to Charles Arthur, Keith Stuart and Tiga's Richard Wilson about the case for the UK video game industry to get tax relief. They also review the new PlayStation Vita handheld console, and look at Google's alleged breach of privacy terms of their rival Apple. Plus, Charles speaks to British company Swiftkey about its touchscreen tech revolution. Don't forget to...
